data.title: Netherlands will once again need to close prisons due to falling crime rate and lack of prisoners.

Human Rights Watch has released a new report detailing the shocking conditions faced by the mentally ill in Indonesia, including being chained up and having to endure sexual violence, electroshock therapy and seclusion in overcrowded institutions - they often only receive treatment by faith healers
North Korea fires short-range projectiles, South Korea says.

U.S. Navy officer arrested after allegedly groping and punching a Japanese woman on an airplane, the second high-profile arrest of a U.S. serviceman for sexually related offenses in Japan in less than a week

Scans of King Tut’s Tomb Reveal New Evidence of Hidden Rooms - Second round of radar scanning will look for more clues to what lies behind the walls of Tut’s burial chamber. One theory: the tomb of famous Queen Nefertiti.
UK asks public to name $300M boat; "Boaty McBoatface" leads vote
Israelis settlers burn a family to death; Settlers then torch the home of the key witness
China Has a $590 Billion Problem With Unpaid Bills
Biden says Israel settlements raise questions about commitment to peace
UN envoy warns of environmental activist murder 'epidemic' | At least 116 environmental defenders were killed in 2014, according to NGO Global Witness, with 40% of whom were indigenous.
